name: mean-lab2
description: Goals: - Create 4 Web pages using HSB Templates.   - Home Page - from Capstone.   - Registration Page     - Appropriate Menu Items     - Forms with username, password, password confirmaiton, email address fields.     - Appripriate validation.       - Checks if user already exists.       - if not adds user and redirects to login.     - If user already exists       - shows message on page.   - Login Page     - Appropriate Menu Items     - User name, Password fields & Error Message.     - If user doesn't exist       - show error message on page.     - Uf yser exsusts       - redirects into landing page.
